info.task: navigate from empty collapsed combobox to last option in listbox popup
info.title: Navigate from an empty, collapsed combobox to the last option in a listbox popup in interaction mode

user: With focus on the combobox, open the combobox and navigate to the last option in the listbox popup.
instructions.raw: With focus on the combobox, open the combobox and navigate to the last option in the listbox popup.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: State of the combobox (expanded) is conveyed
Role of the popup ('listbox') is conveyed
Name of the popup ('States') is conveyed
Text of the focused option in the popup ('Wyoming') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (56) is conveyed
